question: Dame el conteo por objeto contrato, montos de los contratos y ordenes de servicio, debe ser un ranking descendente del todos los tipos de objetos contrato, limitalo a 3 de los mas grandes
query: SELECT objeto_contrato, count(ruc_proveedor) as cantidad, sum(monto) as monto FROM contratos_orden_servicio GROUP BY objeto_contrato ORDER BY cantidad DESC LIMIT 3;

baseline_template.sql_query: SELECT objeto_contrato, count(ruc_proveedor) as cantidad, sum(monto) as monto FROM contratos_orden_servicio GROUP BY objeto_contrato ORDER BY cantidad DESC LIMIT 3;

baseline_agent_simple.sql_query: SELECT co.objeto_contrato, COUNT(*) AS cantidad, SUM(co.monto) AS monto FROM contratos_orden_servicio co GROUP BY co.objeto_contrato ORDER BY monto DESC LIMIT 3;

our_agent.sql_query: SELECT co.objeto_contrato, COUNT(*) AS cantidad, SUM(co.monto) AS monto FROM contratos_orden_servicio co GROUP BY co.objeto_contrato ORDER BY monto DESC LIMIT 3;
